title: New: Paeris Giles – Better
content:
Drenched in hazy summertime wooziness, Better, the new track from Paeris Giles is two minutes of pure loveliness.

With bleary, nostalgic vocals drifting over the minimal guitar lines, this is the perfect soundtrack to a lazy afternoon. Give it a listen below:

[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/139640402″ params=”auto_play=false&hide_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /]
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
